entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
